text: Well done, I hope you managed to answer all those questions in the concept checker. It's time to update your playbook again. Make sure you spend quite a bit of time on this playbook entry, as it's going to summarise pretty much everything we've done up until this point. So, answer the following questions. 1. Using the profile provided, identify all the anomalies. 2. Annotate the basic strategy provided and find and add the same setup to your playbook from the following markets, E-Money S&P 500, German Bunz, WTI Oil and the Euro Dollar FX. And then lastly, set up your demo account. Make sure you spend some time doing all of this, as when we start Module 2, you're going to be expected to have understood everything you've learned in Module 1.
